words.prompt: Original. This is the original painting, not a copy. Original.
Imaginary. Unicorns are imaginary creatures. Imaginary.
Awful. The weather was awful yesterday. Awful.
Calendar. Mark the important date on the calendar. Calendar.
Oxygen. We need oxygen to breathe. Oxygen.
Except. Everyone went to the party except him. Except.
Realize. Did you realize you left your keys? Realize.
Shepherd. The shepherd watched over his flock of sheep. Shepherd.
Diamond. She wore a sparkling diamond necklace. Diamond.
Consequence. Every action has a consequence. Consequence.
Pharmacy. I need to pick up medicine at the pharmacy. Pharmacy.
Vacuum. Please vacuum the living room carpet. Vacuum.
Schedule. Check the bus schedule before you leave. Schedule.
Dictionary. Look up the meaning in the dictionary. Dictionary.
Chocolate. Would you like a piece of chocolate? Chocolate.
Biscuit. He enjoyed a warm biscuit with butter. Biscuit.
Vegetable. Carrots are my favorite vegetable. Vegetable.
Fossil. They found a dinosaur fossil in the rocks. Fossil.
Politician. The politician gave a speech to the crowd. Politician.
Captain. The captain guided the ship through the storm. Captain.
Business. She runs her own small business. Business.
Pleasure. Reading is a great pleasure for me. Pleasure.
Forward. Please move forward in the line. Forward.
Wheelbarrow. He pushed the wheelbarrow full of soil. Wheelbarrow.
Material. What material is this shirt made from? Material.
Hemisphere. We live in the Northern Hemisphere. Hemisphere.
Succeed. With hard work, you will succeed. Succeed.
Island. They spent their vacation on a tropical island. Island.
Journey. Their journey across the country took weeks. Journey.
Necessary. Is it necessary to bring a jacket? Necessary.
Successful. The event was very successful. Successful.
Exaggerate. Please tell the truth and don't exaggerate. Exaggerate.
Syllable. The word 'happy' has two syllables. Syllable.
Weird. I heard a weird noise outside last night. Weird.
Spaghetti. We ate spaghetti and meatballs for dinner. Spaghetti.
Temperature. The temperature dropped below freezing. Temperature.
Height. What is the height of that tall building? Height.
Paralyze. Extreme fear can paralyze someone. Paralyze.
Courageous. The courageous soldier saved his comrades. Courageous.
Professor. The professor teaches chemistry at the university. Professor.
Governor. The governor of the state announced a new plan. Governor.
Achieve. Set goals that you want to achieve. Achieve.
Appreciate. I really appreciate your kindness. Appreciate.
Awkward. There was an awkward silence in the room. Awkward.
Foreign. She enjoys learning foreign languages. Foreign.
Familiar. That song sounds familiar to me. Familiar.
Privilege. It is a privilege to attend this school. Privilege.
Equation. Can you solve this math equation? Equation.
